content: the scarf of possibilities is written in uk terms and is suitable for beginner crocheters upwards with a simple single row repeat the scarf of possibilities produces a lovely wearable item quickly you can make a straight scarf a doubled cowl or a mobius scarf i d love to see your finished projects please tag me on instagram @crochetscot and add #crochetscot to your posts thanks enjoy making and wearing your lovely new scarf
